APURE-R.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. It offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. The company also exports its products. Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

APURE.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. It offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. The company also exports its products. Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

BR-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Ranch Public Company Limited produces and supplies duck meat products in Thailand and internationally. It provides duck portions, including breast fillets, drumsticks, and wings; and by-products. The company also offers pre-cooked products for the fast preparation of meals by food service chains, such as roast duck and smoked duck meat; and ready-made consumer products for supermarkets and retail outlets, including roasted, crispy whole duck, aromatic duck with pancakes and hoisin sauce, and duck drumsticks in orange sauce and sweet chilli sauce under the Dalee, Duck-To, and Canature brands, as well as under various private labels. In addition, it provides animal feed; and operates duck farms, hatcheries, feed mills, and distribution center. Further, the company engages in the duck slaughtering and duck meat trading businesses. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

CPF-R.BK.long_name: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited
CPF-R.BK.summary: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agro-industrial and integrated food businesses in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Livestock Business and Aquaculture Business. The company produces and sells swine, chicken, cattle, duck, shrimp, and fish feeds in powder and pallet forms; and breeds and farms swine, broiler, layer, duck, shrimp, and fish. It is also involved in the animal feed raw materials distribution, investment and international trading, food products wholesale and retail, property investment, property lease-out, and shrimp hatchery and animal feedmill businesses. In addition, the company produces, sells, imports, and distributes processed meat and ready meals, and probiotics. Further, it offers economic and trade consulting, management and advisory, financial guarantee, biological waste management, information technology, food research and development, and financial services. Additionally, the company engages in the operation of food processing plants, quick service restaurants, and training centers; broiler chicken integration business; provision and development of Asian food products; and swine farm construction activities. It provides its products primarily under the CP brand, as well as other company's and customers' brands. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries worldwide. Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPI-R.BK.long_name: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited
CPI-R.BK.summary: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes palm oil products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: The Palm Oil Products; The Palm Seeds, Palm Sprouts, And Coconut Sprouts; and The Electricity. It also provides palm seeds and sprouts, palm seedling products, and crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil; refined bleached deodorized (RBD) palm oil, palm kernel oil, palm olein, and palm stearin; and palm fatty acid distillate, palm kernel fatty acid distillate, and kernel meal, as well as trades in vegetable oil. The company offers its palm oil products for use in food and non-food industry applications; and supplies cooking oils in PET bottles, tins, and pouches under the LEELA, ARO, and Lek Kitchen brands for household consumer market. In addition, it produces and distributes biodiesel, and electricity from biogas. Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tha Sae, Thailand.

EE-R.BK.summary: Eternal Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the cassava plantation activities in Thailand. The company is involved in the plantation of tapioca and other energy crops. It also rents real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Sea Horse Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eternal Energy Public Company Limited in October 2009. Eternal Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LST-R.BK.summary: Lam Soon (Thailand) Public Company Limited operates a crushing mill and a palm oil refinery in Thailand. The company offers cooking oil, margarine, shortening, special fat, and bakery ingredients, which include cocoa powder; and coconut, soybean, sunflower seed, corn, olive, blended canola, sunflower, pure canola, and rice bran oil. It also provides fruits and vegetables packed in can, pouch, and glass containers; fruit juices and juice drinks; coffee and miscellaneous beverages; and sauces and seasonings. In addition, it is involved in the oil palm plantation activities; holding of concessions to use forest reserve land; and generation of electricity using biogases. Lam Soon (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MAX-R.BK.long_name: Max Metal Corporation Public Company Limited
MAX-R.BK.summary: Max Metal Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of palm oil in Thailand. The company also trades in various steel products, such as round bars, deformed bars, lip channel steel, steel pipes, etc. It is also involved in the golf course, restaurant and hotel, and power electric supplies businesses. The company was formerly known as Agro Industrial Machinery Public Company Limited and changed its name to Max Metal Corporation Public Company Limited in 2010. Max Metal Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAV.F.long_name: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited

SUN-R.BK.summary: Sunsweet Public Company Limited, together with subsidiary, engages in the manufacture and distribution of agricultural products in Thailand. It offers fresh and processed fruits and vegetables; canned, pouch, and frozen sweet corns; white beans in tomato sauce; frozen green soy bean; and other by-products, such as corn husk and maize. The company also sources and sells fresh onion, ketchup, canned pineapple, white sugar, fresh coconut, tapioca starch, jasmine rice, dressing, corn oil, soybean oil, sunflower oil, etc. It offers its products under the KC brand name. The company also exports its products to Asia, the Middle East, Europe, Africa, America, Australia, New Zealand, and internationally. Sunsweet Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Chiang Mai, Thailand.

TFG-R.BK.summary: Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces chicken and swine primarily in Thailand and Vietnam. The company operates through Poultry Business, Swine Business, Feed Mill Business, and Others segments. The company engages in chicken breeding, chicken meat production and sales, and sales of day-old chicks, live chickens, and processed chicken; pig breeding, sale of live pig and pork meat; manufacture and sale of feed for animals; provision of research facility services; and production and sales of animal feed sacks, plastic farming equipment, and sauce and seasoning drinks. It also offers chicken products, such as whole chickens, chicken parts, and processed chicken. In addition, the company distributes frozen chicken products; and produces and distributes swine. Further, it engages in the production and distribution of broiler and chilled chicken; research of cattle diseases; manufacture of vaccine, and sacks and plastic sacks; and provision of equipment rental services. Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFG.BK.summary: Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces chicken and swine primarily in Thailand and Vietnam. It also offers chicken products, such as whole chickens, chicken parts, and processed chicken. In addition, the company distributes frozen chicken products; and produces and distributes swine. Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMILL-R.BK.short_name: T S FLOUR MILL PUBLIC COMPANY L
TMILL-R.BK.long_name: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited
TMILL-R.BK.summary: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited produces and distributes wheat flour in Thailand. The company also trades in, imports, and exports wheat, wheat products, and other grains. Its products are used in various bakery and food products, such as bread, noodles, instant noodles, pizza, donut, biscuit, steamed bun, deep-fried stick dough, flat bread, biscuit sponge cake, and cake. The company was formerly known as Thai Sugar Inter Trade Company Limited and changed its name to T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited in 2005. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand. T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Sugar Terminal Public Co., Ltd.

TMILL.BK.short_name: T S FLOUR MILL PUBLIC COMPANY L
TMILL.BK.long_name: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited
TMILL.BK.summary: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited produces and distributes wheat flour in Thailand. The company also trades in, imports, and exports wheat, wheat products, and other grains. Its products are used in various bakery and food products, such as bread, noodles, instant noodles, pizza, donut, biscuit, steamed bun, deep-fried stick dough, flat bread, biscuit sponge cake, and cake. TSTE-R.BK.long_name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited
TSTE-R.BK.summary: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transfer and transportation services for sugar and various agricultural products in Thailand. The company is also involved in the land rental; land trading; land lots appropriation; and office and commercial units rental activities, as well as in the construction of buildings on land for sale. In addition, it engages in the production and distribution of wheat flour; warehousing and loading of goods; property, silo, and warehouse rental activities; extraction of palm oil; and production of packing, polypropylene bag, plastic fiber, plastic resin, and plastic products, as well as provision of port and cargo ship goods transfer services. The company was formerly known as The Thai Sugar Terminal Corporation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited in 1994. Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TSTE.BK.long_name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited

UPOIC-R.BK.long_name: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited
UPOIC-R.BK.summary: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells crude palm oil and palm kernel oil in Thailand. The company operates in two segments: Oil Palm Plantation, Crude Palm Oil, and Crude Palm Kernel Oil Processing; and Generation of Electricity from Biogases and Biomasses. It also holds concessions to use forest reserve land. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Lam Soon (Thailand) Public Company Limited.

UPOIC.BK.long_name: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited

It also holds concessions to use forest reserve land. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Lam Soon (Thailand) Public Company Limited.

UVAN-R.BK.long_name: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited
UVAN-R.BK.summary: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited engages in the oil palm plantations, palm fruit processing, and oil palm seed and seedling businesses in Thailand. The company produces crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil, which are ingredients in the manufacture of cooking oils, margarines, snack foods, dairy substitutes, soaps, and cosmetics. It also operates electric power plant with methane capture biogas project. The company also exports its products. Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Krabi, Thailand.
